abstract: DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin talks to the chairman of Berkshire Hathaway about the lessons learned from the situation with David Sokol, including what Mr. Buffett would have done differently.
snippet: DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin talks to the chairman of Berkshire Hathaway about the lessons learned from the situation with David Sokol, including what Mr. Buffett would have done differently.
lead_paragraph: DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin talks to the chairman of Berkshire Hathaway about the lessons learned from the situation with David Sokol, including what Mr. Buffett would have done differently.

headline.main: Warren Buffett on the Sokol Affair
